CriteriaContainer<T> - Class in org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer
CriteriaContainer enables using JPA 2.0 Criteria type-safe queries with lazy batch loading, filter, sort and buffered writes.
CriteriaContainer(CritQueryDefinition<T>, CritQueryFactory<T>) - Constructor for class org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer.CriteriaContainer
Standard constructor for type-safe queries.
CriteriaContainer(EntityManager, boolean, Class<T>, int, Object[], boolean[]) - Constructor for class org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer.CriteriaContainer
Constructor for typical case where an entity is queried and sorted.

CritRestriction - Class in org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer
Define simple restrictions to be added to the WHERE clause Useful because we cannot defined JPA2.0 Expressions independently of an EntityManager.
CritRestriction(String, CritRestriction.Operation, Object) - Constructor for class org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer.CritRestriction
A restriction to be added to the WHERE clause.
CritRestriction.Operation - Enum in org.vaadin.addons.criteriacontainer
List of supported operators Operators GE, GT, LE and LT work on both numbers and strings.
